title: Catalytic function of ionic liquids in polyethylene terephthalate glycolysis by molecular dynamics simulations
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2677-2683
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00251B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohamed Ahmed Nosir, Manuel Angel Ortuño
This computational work provides an atomic description of the solvation scenario of PET glycolysis using ionic liquid catalysts, showing the distinct role of anions and cations in the process.
